Package cz.cvut.fel.constructa.service

Class CompanyServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.constructa.service.CompanyServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompanyService
@Service public class CompanyServiceImpl extends Object implements CompanyService
A service class that provides CRUD operations for companies and their locations.
